verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, when the king sat in his house, and the Lord had given him rest round about from all his enemies;
verses.verse_html: 1And it came to pass, when the king sat in his house, and the Lord had given him rest round about from all his enemies;

tokens.text: And it came to pass, when the king

verses.text_plain: That the king said unto Nathan the prophet, See now, I dwell in an house of cedar, but the ark of God dwelleth within curtains.
verses.verse_html: 2That the king said unto Nathan the prophet, See now, I dwell in an house of cedar, but the ark of God dwelleth within curtains.

verses.text_plain: And Nathan said to the king, Go, do all that is in thine heart; for the Lord is with thee.
verses.verse_html: 3And Nathan said to the king, Go, do all that is in thine heart; for the Lord is with thee.

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass that night, that the word of the Lord came unto Nathan, saying,
verses.verse_html: 4And it came to pass that night, that the word of the Lord came unto Nathan, saying,

tokens.text: And it came to pass that night

verses.text_plain: Go and tell my servant David, Thus saith the Lord, Shalt thou build me an house for me to dwell in?
verses.verse_html:
5Go and tell my servant David, Thus saith the Lord, Shalt thou build me an house for me to dwell in? ▼
▼ my servant…: Heb. to my servant, to David

footnotes.body_text: ▼ my servant…: Heb. to my servant, to David
footnotes.body_html: ▼ my servant…: Heb. to my servant, to David

verses.text_plain: Whereas I have not dwelt in any house since the time that I brought up the children of Israel out of Egypt, even to this day, but have walked in a tent and in a tabernacle.
verses.verse_html: 6Whereas I have not dwelt in any house since the time that I brought up the children of Israel out of Egypt, even to this day, but have walked in a tent and in a tabernacle.

verses.text_plain: In all the places wherein I have walked with all the children of Israel spake I a word with any of the tribes of Israel, whom I commanded to feed my people Israel, saying, Why build ye not me an house of cedar?
verses.verse_html:
7In all the places wherein I have walked with all the children of Israel spake I a word with any of the tribes of Israel, whom I commanded to feed my people Israel, saying, Why build ye not me an house of cedar? ▼
▼ any of…: any of the judges

footnotes.body_text: ▼ any of…: any of the judges
footnotes.body_html: ▼ any of…: any of the judges

verses.text_plain: Now therefore so shalt thou say unto my servant David, Thus saith the Lord of hosts, I took thee from the sheepcote, from following the sheep, to be ruler over my people, over Israel:
verses.verse_html:
8Now therefore so shalt thou say unto my servant David, Thus saith the Lord of hosts, I took thee from the sheepcote, from following the sheep, to be ruler over my people, over Israel: ▼
▼ from following: Heb. from after

tokens.text: Now therefore so shalt thou say

footnotes.body_html: ▼ from following: Heb. from after

verses.text_plain: And I was with thee whithersoever thou wentest, and have cut off all thine enemies out of thy sight, and have made thee a great name, like unto the name of the great men that are in the earth.
verses.verse_html:
9And I was with thee whithersoever thou wentest, and have cut off all thine enemies out of thy sight, and have made thee a great name, like unto the name of the great men that are in the earth. ▼
▼ out of…: Heb. from thy face

tokens.text: And I was with thee whithersoever thou wentest

footnotes.body_text: ▼ out of…: Heb. from thy face
footnotes.body_html: ▼ out of…: Heb. from thy face

verses.text_plain: Moreover I will appoint a place for my people Israel, and will plant them, that they may dwell in a place of their own, and move no more; neither shall the children of wickedness afflict them any more, as beforetime,
verses.verse_html: 10Moreover I will appoint a place for my people Israel, and will plant them, that they may dwell in a place of their own, and move no more; neither shall the children of wickedness afflict them any more, as beforetime,

tokens.text: in a place of their own, and move
no more; neither shall the children

verses.text_plain: And as since the time that I commanded judges to be over my people Israel, and have caused thee to rest from all thine enemies. Also the Lord telleth thee that he will make thee an house.
verses.verse_html: 11And as since the time that I commanded judges to be over my people Israel, and have caused thee to rest from all thine enemies. Also the Lord telleth thee that he will make thee an house.

tokens.text: and have caused thee to rest

verses.text_plain: And when thy days be fulfilled, and thou shalt sleep with thy fathers, I will set up thy seed after thee, which shall proceed out of thy bowels, and I will establish his kingdom.
verses.verse_html: 12And when thy days be fulfilled, and thou shalt sleep with thy fathers, I will set up thy seed after thee, which shall proceed out of thy bowels, and I will establish his kingdom.

verses.text_plain: He shall build an house for my name, and I will stablish the throne of his kingdom for ever.
verses.verse_html: 13He shall build an house for my name, and I will stablish the throne of his kingdom for ever.

verses.text_plain: I will be his father, and he shall be my son. If he commit iniquity, I will chasten him with the rod of men, and with the stripes of the children of men:
verses.verse_html: 14I will be his father, and he shall be my son. If he commit iniquity, I will chasten him with the rod of men, and with the stripes of the children of men:

tokens.text: and he shall be my son

verses.text_plain: But my mercy shall not depart away from him, as I took it from Saul, whom I put away before thee.
verses.verse_html: 15But my mercy shall not depart away from him, as I took it from Saul, whom I put away before thee.

verses.text_plain: And thine house and thy kingdom shall be established for ever before thee: thy throne shall be established for ever.
verses.verse_html: 16And thine house and thy kingdom shall be established for ever before thee: thy throne shall be established for ever.

verses.text_plain: According to all these words, and according to all this vision, so did Nathan speak unto David.
verses.verse_html: 17According to all these words, and according to all this vision, so did Nathan speak unto David.

tokens.text: and according to all this vision

verses.text_plain: Then went king David in, and sat before the Lord, and he said, Who am I, O Lord God? and what is my house, that thou hast brought me hitherto?
verses.verse_html: 18Then went king David in, and sat before the Lord, and he said, Who am I, O Lord God? and what is my house, that thou hast brought me hitherto?

verses.text_plain: And this was yet a small thing in thy sight, O Lord God; but thou hast spoken also of thy servant’s house for a great while to come. And is this the manner of man, O Lord God?
verses.verse_html:
19And this was yet a small thing in thy sight, O Lord God; but thou hast spoken also of thy servant’s house for a great while to come. And is this the manner of man, O Lord God? ▼
▼ manner: Heb. law

tokens.text: And this was yet a small thing
for a great while to come

verses.text_plain: And what can David say more unto thee? for thou, Lord God, knowest thy servant.
verses.verse_html: 20And what can David say more unto thee? for thou, Lord God, knowest thy servant.

verses.text_plain: For thy word’s sake, and according to thine own heart, hast thou done all these great things, to make thy servant know them.
verses.verse_html: 21For thy word’s sake, and according to thine own heart, hast thou done all these great things, to make thy servant know them.

tokens.text: sake, and according to thine own heart

verses.text_plain: Wherefore thou art great, O Lord God: for there is none like thee, neither is there any God beside thee, according to all that we have heard with our ears.
verses.verse_html: 22Wherefore thou art great, O Lord God: for there is none like thee, neither is there any God beside thee, according to all that we have heard with our ears.

tokens.text: thee, according to all that we have heard

verses.text_plain: And what one nation in the earth is like thy people, even like Israel, whom God went to redeem for a people to himself, and to make him a name, and to do for you great things and terrible, for thy land, before thy people, which thou redeemedst to thee from Egypt, from the nations and their gods?
verses.verse_html: 23And what one nation in the earth is like thy people, even like Israel, whom God went to redeem for a people to himself, and to make him a name, and to do for you great things and terrible, for thy land, before thy people, which thou redeemedst to thee from Egypt, from the nations and their gods?

verses.text_plain: For thou hast confirmed to thyself thy people Israel to be a people unto thee for ever: and thou, Lord, art become their God.
verses.verse_html: 24For thou hast confirmed to thyself thy people Israel to be a people unto thee for ever: and thou, Lord, art become their God.

verses.text_plain: And now, O Lord God, the word that thou hast spoken concerning thy servant, and concerning his house, establish it for ever, and do as thou hast said.
verses.verse_html: 25And now, O Lord God, the word that thou hast spoken concerning thy servant, and concerning his house, establish it for ever, and do as thou hast said.

verses.text_plain: And let thy name be magnified for ever, saying, The Lord of hosts is the God over Israel: and let the house of thy servant David be established before thee.
verses.verse_html: 26And let thy name be magnified for ever, saying, The Lord of hosts is the God over Israel: and let the house of thy servant David be established before thee.

verses.text_plain: For thou, O Lord of hosts, God of Israel, hast revealed to thy servant, saying, I will build thee an house: therefore hath thy servant found in his heart to pray this prayer unto thee.
verses.verse_html:
27For thou, O Lord of hosts, God of Israel, hast revealed to thy servant, saying, I will build thee an house: therefore hath thy servant found in his heart to pray this prayer unto thee. ▼
▼ revealed: Heb. opened the ear

footnotes.body_html: ▼ revealed: Heb. opened the ear

verses.text_plain: And now, O Lord God, thou art that God, and thy words be true, and thou hast promised this goodness unto thy servant:
verses.verse_html: 28And now, O Lord God, thou art that God, and thy words be true, and thou hast promised this goodness unto thy servant:

verses.text_plain: Therefore now let it please thee to bless the house of thy servant, that it may continue for ever before thee: for thou, O Lord God, hast spoken it: and with thy blessing let the house of thy servant be blessed for ever.
verses.verse_html:
29Therefore now let it please thee to bless the house of thy servant, that it may continue for ever before thee: for thou, O Lord God, hast spoken it: and with thy blessing let the house of thy servant be blessed for ever. ▼
▼ let it…: Heb. be thou pleased and bless

tokens.text: that it may continue for ever

footnotes.body_text: ▼ let it…: Heb. be thou pleased and bless
footnotes.body_html: ▼ let it…: Heb. be thou pleased and bless
